snippet: Andy Murray hailed his Davis Cup team mate Kyle Edmund as the future of British tennis on Friday after subduing a robust challenge from his potential young successor to reach the semi-finals of the Aegon Championships....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray hailed his Davis Cup team mate Kyle Edmund as the future of British tennis on Friday after subduing a robust challenge from his potential young successor to reach the semi-finals of the Aegon Championships.

headline.print_headline: Murray Hails Edmund After Winning All-British Clash
headline.main: Murray Hails Edmund After Winning All-British Clash
